message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those who appreciate its unique features and benefits. Given its quality and the effort put into it, I propose a price of $200 for this item. I look forward to your consideration.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value you place on your product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the product's value. While I respect your budget constraints, I would like to maintain the integrity of the product's pricing. I am willing to negotiate further, so I propose a counteroffer of $175 for the item. I hope this aligns more closely with your budget while still reflecting the product's worth.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've considered your proposal and while I appreciate the reduction, I'm still working within a tight budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $160 for the item. This price reflects a balance between respecting the product's value and staying within my financial limits.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. To further address your budget concerns while still ensuring fair compensation for the product, I propose a counter-counteroffer of $165. I believe this price strikes a good balance between the product's value and your financial situation. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Alice. I've thought about it carefully and decided to counter with an offer of $162 for the item. This price aims to find a fair compromise between the product's value and my budget constraints.
